text: Michael Bauer may refer to: * Michael Bauer (artist) (born 1973), German artist * Michael Gerard Bauer (born 1955), Australian author * Michael Bauer (basketball) (born 1980), American basketball player * Mike Bauer (born 1959), American tennis player * Michael Bauer (officer) (1895–1943), German officer * Michael Bauer, a character in Fashion House * Michael W. Bauer (born 1969), German political scientist
title: Michael Bauer
